de.dhbw_stuttgart.hb.inf2016.RaumKartierung.Server.VectorRoom

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw_stuttgart.hb.inf2016.RaumKartierung.Server.VectorRoom.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves the position and the angle of the sensor on the robot. It calculates the current position of the sensor using the spacing between the rotation point of the robot and the sensor and and the position and angle of the robot.
    Author:
    Samuel Volz

        public Sensor(Robot robot,
